title: Unmuted Tab Still Not Playing Audio
content:
I was listening to a podcast on google podcasts, when I opened a link to a youtube video and briefly muted the tab that I had the podcast opened in. Once I closed the video and unmuted the tab with the podcast, it still is not making any sound. Other websites such as youtube are still making sound correctly. The podcast website's volume bar is NOT muted, I have also confirmed my windows 10 audio settings are configured properly still. So far to fix this issue I have tried: 1. muting and unmuting the tab again by right clicking on it. 2. closing the podcast and opening it in a new firefox window. 3. checking my windows volume mixer, which is not muted and shows no audio output from firefox despite the podcast playing (according to the progress bar on google podcasts). 4. clearing the firefox cache/cookies for google.com 5. signing out and back in to google. 6. completely closing and reopening firefox (I did restore session to keep other windows I have open, though). 7. unplugging and re-inserting my headphones. 8. looking through relevant support topics on this site. 9. Disabling my adblock add-on and reloading the page.

I'm hoping for some additional suggestions to try to fix this, I believe the above list shows I've tried all standard/obvious fixes, but maybe there is something I'm unaware of.
creator: smith4e4

title: Firefox - Drag bookmark to folder problem
content:
Hi everyone

I can no longer drag a bookmark to a folder and insert it where I need to in the folder, which previously was very useful.

Now when I drag a bookmark and try to insert it where I need to it defaults to inserting it as the first / top bookmark in the folder. Which means I have to drag it a second time to its desired position.

Please could anyone advise about how to get the functionality back.

Thanks in advance !

title: Google websites horrible loading on all of my computers
content:
Hello support,

I have problems with loading the google websites. See the link with the video:

Video how google cannot be load

  • Tried to use troubleshoot mode - issue still persist
  • Cookies and Site data has been cleared, Firefox restarted - issue still persist
  • Browsing data has been cleared, Firefox restarted - issue still persist
  • Hardware acceleration has been turned ON / turned OFF - , Firefox restarted - issue still persist
  • No proxy settings - issue still persist
  • Tried on all of my 3 computers, same issue - I have Firefox connected to your cloud on all of my computers
  • I tried 3 different internet networks and providers, same issue
  • On 2 my personal computers is running Awast anti-virus, on my third company computer there is not Awast but there is other security anti-virus of company where I'm working, so this should also have no impact on....

Tried other internet browsers Edge, Chrome, there is no issue, every site from google running smoothly and without any problem.

content:

I am on a desktop PC using Windows 10 Pro.

title: Onko läppärini hakkeroitu?
content:
Hei

Haluan tämän tiedoksi ylläpitoihmisille ja tekniseen tukeen.

Eilen olin avannut kaksi ikkunaa, minulla oli bluethoot-kuulokkeet joissa on ilmeisesti myös mikrofoni. Olin toisella sivulla youtube sivuilla katselemassa videoita ja sain yhden loppuun ja siirryin toiselle sivustolle sulkematta edellistä sivua. Yhtäkkiä kuulin suomeksi sanottuna jotain kommenteja seuraamastani sivustosta. Luulin ensin että se on jotain youtuben jälkimainoksia muttei niin kaiketi ollut. Vaan joku oli hakkeroinut minut. Suljin kaikki laitteet. Ajoin Cclearin. Mietin asiaa. Tulin siihen päätökseen että joku oli hakkeroinut minut käyttäen Youtuben sivustoa ja päässyt bluethoot laitteeseeni käsiksi. (Olin peittänyt läppärini kamerat.) Kysymykseni kuuluukin mitä voin tehdä estääkseni jatkossa tämmöisen ikävän tapahtuman? Käyttääkö hakkerit jotain määrättyä kaavaa, tai videoita tähän? Lisäksi youtubea katsoessani näytölle tuli popup-ilmoitus jossa luki että on tullut uusi websoitin jonka saa ilmaiseksi tässä. En ajatellut sitä silloin kun painoin ei-nappia. Mutta sen kökkö ulkoasu kertoo ettei se kaiketi tullut youtubesta. Käytän Firefox selainta, uusinta.

Kiitos vastauksista
creator: mjjaakko

title: Imperva - Error 15
content:
I have had 2 sites produce this error box in place of the target Web Site (See Picture). I have read previous topics about this and have followed the instructions with no positive results. FYI, clearing the web site's cookies, clearing Cache and disabling Hardware acceleration.

The first was https://www.walmart.com. After leaving a "Feedback" 2 weeks ago it appears as if they were able to fix the problem. However, the site is not as important as my Medicare PPO provider. I tried loading previous versions of Firefox, but that did not help.

In both instances the LOL "support" people's response was to try a different Browser. So, I reluctantly loaded Google Chrome and it worked perfectly. From my perspective, this eliminates everything to do with my machine setup.

Below is the sign-on URL (not unique to me). Please note that this 668 character URL has not changed for over a year. It is just Aetna's adoption of the Imperva Security Firewall. Both my Winders 8.1 and Winders 10 machines produce the identical results.

https://www.aetna.com/AccountManagerV3/v/login?identityTransaction=VIhzS3Xx1ogw4rzQY5lXUvDYBtXFZiXttegdT9ffK%2FOZ8oTHnKbryvfgfagvpO0aknHiEN2hnELOIkjfz3eJNeBfKQ%2FUDo0hSJHhjsdZdJw0rkVj%2BFjAVYypzW5kRH%2FzzOlbxrN6KKpjWvagusMp%2BzwgQqvg5xvUkwLCs3MlD%2BkzHOTVKlu4GYxJgmzr3Y9NUdFGUI9PHurN4QxSyvXxNjJ4jSSL4NHuctvtQyV1fUh%2FOqpHJglcALQuuNeyQ1QncyKPZJYf5rj1DLC2zrxKX0VgVWQZfSbw5Pouiv%2FWfwWxArHPHcV5cXr3kI2j33C8dUl0Jdup0nvdVs%2Bxigzp%2BmMQUaHxaw3B7tiJ7eokyNMgvG4V5SPw9FL5j3mhwBAirx%2BmX7Yj0qDZZNRl8z1WcvHen8HwsDijtH4Sg%2FNdsuzhXIw8snHF6hUd4n3MbJerO8nRUdzKR%2BhNCNq%2FjeuQWmT1cyQ3QtmIXcL0ab42vk6or1SX5wG%2BIMF%2Bk6ZJQw8h&appname=NAV&branding=&skin=&language=&channel=web
